item.title: UPST
item.description: score:-57 Chances: Despite the recent stock price decline, Upstart’s long-term growth potential remains promising due to its AI-powered lending marketplace. Upstart generated revenue growth, reaching $136 million in the last quarter, indicating its ability to generate strong sales in its niche. The company’s performance in the second quarter was better than feared, with better-than-expected Q2 results and revenue.
